column5: Hit an easter trib today with low expectations due to low and gin clear water. Well im glad I went anyways, it was a great day on the water! It started off with 3 or 4 smaller brown trout, and then in a run about 4 feet deep my  float goes down and i set the hook into a 10 pound plus female steelhead. After quite the battle, which involved me chest deep in water removing the line from a tree while still fighting the fish he pulled drag 50 feet downstream into a beaver dam, and well you know what happens after that. After I stopped shaking long enough to tie a new lead on, I managed to hook into my PB brown, a hog a just shy of 30 inches!     Hopefully Ill be back tomorrow with a report of getting that big hen that broke me off today.  tightlines
congrats on the pb and good day of fishing
WOW...Awesome big,brown trout !!!!!!!! man thats a big male.  ..too bad about that big steelie having her way with you..  ..maybe you can get her interested again..good-luck & cheers
Congrats on the new PB...beauty!  There is something about the fish that you catch/hook when your expectations are low....gotta love em!!

Thanks everyone, I have pictures of  5-6 other browns I caught today (they were on fire!) but theyre on my cell phone and at the moment im a little to lazy to turn them into multimedia messages and send them to my email... I REALLY need a digital camera.
Good job Kemper!!  Thats a super thick brown for sure!!!  Burt
Great report and pics!!!  Post the other pics if the fish had nice colors!
nice fish congrats on the pb
Just a beautiful fish, Kemper. WTG!
Nice brown. They sure are colourful!
